TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ECDiffieHellman extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class ECDiffieHellman Inherits AsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: 提供一个抽象基类，可以从它派生椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 算法实现。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class that Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm implementations can derive from.

summary.span: 此类提供一个所有 ECDH 实现都必须支持的基本操作集。

span.span: This class provides the basic set of operations that all ECDH implementations must support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用作 ECDH 实现的抽象基类。This class serves as the abstract base class for ECDH implementations.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从派生类调用此构造函数类。This constructor is called by classes that derive from the class. 类是唯一的实现，现在已在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。The class is the only implementation that is currently included in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关如何创建椭圆曲线 Diffie-hellman (ECDH) 算法的新实现的信息，请参阅方法。For information about how to create a new implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm, see the method.

summary.span: 创建椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 算法的实现的一个新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of an implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

summary.span: 使用通过指定曲线生成的新公钥/私钥对，创建椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 算法的默认实现的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm with a new public/private key-pair generated over the specified curve.

returns.span: 椭圆曲线 Diffie-hellman (ECDH) 算法的默认实现的新实例。

span.span: A new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须验证曲线 (即，它必须返回 true 时传递给方法。curve must validate (that is, it must return true when passed to the method. 在 Windows 上不支持特征 2 曲线。Characteristic-2 curves are not supported on Windows.

span.span: does not validate.

span.span: The parameters for the elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) algorithm.

summary.span: 创建椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 算法的默认实现的新实例，密钥由指定的 对象描述。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm with the key described by the specified object.

returns.span: 椭圆曲线 Diffie-hellman (ECDH) 算法的默认实现的新实例。

span.span: A new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `parameters` 必须验证 (即，它必须返回`true`) 时传递给方法。`parameters` must validate (that is, it must return `true`) when passed to the method. 不支持通过隐式曲线参数。Parameters over implicit curves are not supported. 在 Windows 上不支持特征 2 曲线。Characteristic-2 curves are not supported on Windows.

span.span: does not validate.

summary.span: 创建椭圆曲线 Diffie-hellman (ECDH) 算法的特定实现的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

returns.span: 此类的指定实现的新实例。

span.span: A new instance of the specified implementation of this class.

returns.span: 如果指定的算法名称未映射到 ECDH 实现，此方法将返回 。

span.span: If the specified algorithm name does not map to an ECDH implementation, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您开发自己的实现对象，可以使用方法重载来创建自定义`algorithm`字符串，指定您的实现。If you develop your own implementation of an object, you can use the method overload to create a custom `algorithm` string that specifies your implementation. `algorithm`参数指定 ECDH 算法的实现的名称。The `algorithm` parameter specifies the name of an implementation of the ECDH algorithm. 以下字符串指的是同一个实现，它是当前 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中支持的唯一实现。The following strings all refer to the same implementation, which is the only implementation currently supported in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]: - "ECDH""ECDH" - "ECDiffieHellman""ECDiffieHellman" - "ECDiffieHellmanCng""ECDiffieHellmanCng" - "System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng""System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng" 此外可以提供的名称的自定义 ECDH 实现`algorithm`参数。You can also provide the name of a custom ECDH implementation for the `algorithm` parameter. 如果您这样做，对象将使用它来确定是否可以创建一个 ECDH 对象。If you do that, the object will use it to determine whether an ECDH object can be created.

span.span: The parameter is .

span.span: Derives bytes that can be used as a key using a hash function .

param.name: parameters
param.span: 要导入的曲线参数。

span.span: The curve's parameters to import.

summary.span: 在派生类中替代时，将 的指定参数作为临时密钥导入到当前 对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, imports the specified parameters for an as an ephemeral key into the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `parameters` 必须验证 (即，它必须返回`true`) 时传递给方法。`parameters` must validate (that is, it must return `true`) when passed to the method. 不支持通过隐式曲线参数。Parameters over implicit curves are not supported. 在 Windows 上不支持特征 2 曲线。Characteristic-2 curves are not supported on Windows.

span.span: does not validate.

exception.span: 派生方法必须重写此方法。

span.span: A derived class must override this method.

span.span: The public part of the ECDH key pair that is being used by this instance.

summary.span: 获取签名算法的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the signature algorithm.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性继承自基类。This property is inherited from the base class. 椭圆曲线 Diffie-hellman (ECDH) 算法用于密钥派生，不是数字签名生成。The Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm is used for key derivation, not digital signature generation. 因此，此属性将返回`null`。Therefore, this property returns `null`.
